default_operator.title: Beginning
default_operator.how: Socialisation and specialisation means we can do more complicated things together...
default_operator.description: Socialisation and specialisation means we can do more complicated things together...

1roc1z.title: private property
1roc1z.description: This tent is only big enough for the one of us! / I worked hard for that!

99kkg5.title: culture
99kkg5.description: A good way to teach kids and to keep entertained is to tell stories.

nf9jy9.title: permanent residence
nf9jy9.description: Let's settle in plains, near rivers, where there's water and fertile soil, instead of in caves.

jjveut.title: internet
jjveut.description: twice the computers, an order of magnitude more fun

8hqtmr.title: Tentmaking
8hqtmr.description: With enough cloth sewed together, I can make a portable cave. Now I can live in fields.

yxhum1.title: paleolithic weaponry
yxhum1.description: With my club, stone axe and stone spear, I can hunt more effectively!.. and resolve arguments more violently...

g0c9eu.how: Hit stones to get sharper stones, then use them to skin animals.
g0c9eu.title: Chipped stone tooling
g0c9eu.description: Hit stones to get sharper stones, then use them to skin animals.

kjiq2m.title: tribal wear making
kjiq2m.description: Bigger animals hunted means bigger pelts, and something to wear! Also flax can be used as string.

apo4gh.title: Field taxonomy
apo4gh.description: Red berries kill you. Blue ones don't. Don't eat red berries.

70rvss.title: agriculture
70rvss.description: Look! more plants are growing from the remains of the plants! Let's formalise it!

r13q.title: Cave painting
r13q.description: Crush rocks to make paint, and then do some home deco.

q8avqe.how: Make roasting easier with sharp wooden sticks.
q8avqe.title: wooden tools
q8avqe.description: Make roasting easier with sharp wooden sticks.

x0dzky.how: Its important to keep the fire going from night to night...
x0dzky.title: Firetending
x0dzky.description: It is important to keep the fire going from night to night so we can keep enjoying cooked food.

rwmj25.how: A new source of energy means we can cook our food, and it tastes better.
rwmj25.title: Fire (Cooking food)
rwmj25.description: A new source of energy means we can cook our food, and it tasks better.

khq4uz.title: paleolithic first aid
khq4uz.description: If we apply green leaf to wound it tends to help.

yzjixy.title: Hoe
yzjixy.description: Gotta clear out other plants so that mine can grow.

4o9xmn.title: Clay
4o9xmn.description: We can shape mud into structures and let the sun dry them into shape.

unkkch.title: Firemaking
unkkch.description: Get some sinew, a stick and some brush, and voila! fire!

awpjb1.title: Canine domestication
awpjb1.description: Those wolves outside are kinda cute!

oi6upc.title: livestock domestication
oi6upc.description: all baby animals are cute! and yummy!

zhp99b.title: plough
zhp99b.description: we can get bulls to do work for us!

7dswuo.title: Smelting
7dswuo.description: Look, we get copper...ah, this green stuff, near our campfires! What if we keep burning?

yp77fv.title: copper tools
yp77fv.description: This shiny stuff can get really sharp.

yhlp29.title: Finer Carpentry
yhlp29.description: No more puny sticks, this is the good stuff.

nv4lpe.title: Wheels (3500 bc)
nv4lpe.description: We can now cut wood precisely enough to make wheels. Great!

hmo7ms.title: horse-drawn carts
hmo7ms.description: this makes travelling over long distances suuper easy.

fjl3g8.title: Shipmaking
fjl3g8.description: Time to head on over ocean!

ljy56r.title: Sewing (30000BC)
ljy56r.description:
Sewing needles means we can make clothes!
https://www.sewanastasia.com/blog/the-history-of-sewing-part-1-inventing-the-sewing-needle-60000-years-ago-22000-years-ago

qsyair.title: Fishing hooks 22000BCE
qsyair.description: What else were they going to eat in japan?

ac1arb.title: Monarchy
ac1arb.description: Leader is king. Leader's son is king. Leader's son's son is... wait why is he king again?

5atski.title: Money
5atski.description: I don't have anything to give you now, but here's an IOU.

lr26uk.title: Family
lr26uk.description: We live together, but not together with everyone, yknow?

o37jci.title: War (9000BC)
o37jci.description: You offend me / we need your livestock/whatever

7ilfdk.title: Pottery
7ilfdk.description: You can store stuff in this!

ujiua8.title: Food preservation
ujiua8.description: I know, it tastes like vinegar, but its better than starving...

ez071v.title: Water mill (90BC)
ez071v.description: Why not harness the power of water?

okolhz.title: Quern (flour mill) 200BC
okolhz.description:
No more bashing flour to get wheat. This is wayyy faster.
http://www.angelfire.com/journal/pondlilymill/elton.html#anchor223415

89df8f.title: Horse / slave mill (100BC)
89df8f.description: get an ass to do it. either one will do.

3x7x6h.title: Windmill 1000 AD
3x7x6h.description: The nearby river is pathetic but the wind is strong af.

qjhueq.title: Sawmill (200AD)
qjhueq.description: Add some more levers and this machine can help us cut wood!

bykiye.title: Simple machines (3BC)
bykiye.description: We can join our water wheel and a bunch of levers, to crush rocks for smelting!

5sekcs.title: Compass Navigation (1111 BC)
5sekcs.description: This metal seems to always point in the same direction...

d97bqb.title: Bronze (4500BC)
d97bqb.description: Mix two metals, get one stronger.

aeq1o7.title: Iron (1200BC)
aeq1o7.description: This one's a lot easier to find than tin.

vzpq4v.title: Horse warfare, messengers
vzpq4v.description: We can now coordinate over long distances!

wmp9cb.title: Empires
wmp9cb.description: We can now take over huge amounts of land!

nlrtsw.title: Paved roads 4000BC
nlrtsw.description: Suspension hasn't been invented yet, so i guess we'll have to build roads for now.

1wsrm7.title: Tar roads 800BC
1wsrm7.description: These are much better under weather.

41cqrj.title: Oil 100BC
41cqrj.description: Hey, this black stuff isn't water! And it burns!

fbg8b9.title: Kerosene 1000BC
fbg8b9.description: Smells less bad. Burns much brighter.

yn4qoc.title: Counting
yn4qoc.description: Now I have a lot of money/grain. How do i record it?

z2gjit.title: Mathematics
z2gjit.description: What if i had a quantity of something, but without the quantity?

h35kta.title: Brickmaking
h35kta.description: Make stone out of mud. And stone out of stone.

ul1qg7.title: Engineering
ul1qg7.description: Society is big enough for dedicated construction workers.

51pu5l.title: Trading
51pu5l.description: Making a living solely by moving things around, for money

v77iqd.title: Printing press
v77iqd.description: Suddenly, we can make more bibles. Spread the word, peoples

9lrjrs.title: religion
9lrjrs.description: Whoops, kids grew up thinking the stories were real. And they're using it to explain stuff.

fch8d5.title: Nautral Philosophy
fch8d5.description: A reaction to religion, resting on the laurels of trade.

5zyd8p.title: Algebra
5zyd8p.description: What if i had a something of quantity, without a quantity?

m0dfyw.title: bone tooling
m0dfyw.description: from the remains of our enemies...

vh84fs.title: astronomical navigation
vh84fs.description: that star seems to not have moved...

2k3sok.title: paper making
2k3sok.description: huh, we can write on this stuff... and it doesn't fall apart!

zfvkx5.title: papyrus
zfvkx5.description: huh, we can write on this stuff.

oe6xjm.title: Vellum
oe6xjm.description: i guess animal skin works too

q356mh.title: History
q356mh.description: everyone must know what i did

fbs0yj.title: geometry
fbs0yj.description: theres a relation between certain shapes

nq2o3m.title: lead glassmaking
nq2o3m.description:
a lot easier to work with.
Can be blown, too!

ovbphv.title: chemistry
ovbphv.description: we can reliably break things down now.

v9ypb2.title: germ theory
v9ypb2.description: what if living things were made of smaller living things?

m23esc.title: astrophysics
m23esc.description: We can predict the stars now!

8o2mrc.title: atomic theory
8o2mrc.description: there are small things which cant be split

g6j3jv.title: decimals
g6j3jv.description: What's smaller than 1, but more than none?

618ygk.title: magnetism
618ygk.description: This rock attracts this other rock...

9nt65i.title: geomagnetism
9nt65i.description: huh, the earth is a magnet

t7ojpd.title: elements
t7ojpd.description: these things are definitely not the same

mjdelj.title: avogadrian chemistry
mjdelj.description: compounds can form in different ways

cwx9vj.title: synthetic chemistry
cwx9vj.description: combining organic chemicals to form other organic chemicals

x8zw48.title: Chemical fertiliser
x8zw48.description: now our crops run on chemicals

tvuc01.title: selective breeding
tvuc01.description: this corn looks bigger. let's not eat it!

d3hpy5.title: thermometers
d3hpy5.description: ooh this liquid expands when hot!

4491k3.title: general relativity
4491k3.description: gravity just got a lot harder

83rgkg.title: electricity
83rgkg.description: amber on a towel ,and metal in the mouth

h178j6.title: Welding
h178j6.description: some metals are softer than others

xxrtrr.title: diffraction
xxrtrr.description: light splits when there are slits

buaprs.title: fractional distillation
buaprs.description: more fun things to do with oil

ml5vi6.title: quantum electrodynamics
ml5vi6.description: closer to a theory of everything

lcahsy.title: radio telescopy
lcahsy.description: I can see realll far now

reftn7.title: rubber
reftn7.description: more sticky than bouncy at this point

wp8mtn.title: silicon
wp8mtn.description: not a metal, not a nonmetal

k9nev1.title: archaeology
k9nev1.description: digging up stuff cos its cool

7dmeqp.title: USB
7dmeqp.description: everybody talking to everybody (not you mac)

l6hptc.title: microwave radio
l6hptc.description: data at speeds youve never seen

jc8lea.title: Government
jc8lea.description: this is getting too big to handle

tgp0yp.title: democracy
tgp0yp.description: what if everyone had a say?

qhgbjh.title: craftsmanship
qhgbjh.description: Now that I can setup shop, I can make cool things

7nl2pz.title: globalisation
7nl2pz.description:
reaction to mercantilism. we're all in this together
productivity

n9dnkp.title: surgery
n9dnkp.description: cut you up and stitch you together

ju7awr.title: Bluetooth Wifi
ju7awr.description: low power radio comms for all
